tool_description: Performs currency conversion calculations using provided exchange rates with precision handling.

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate from source to target currency

decimal_places.description: Number of decimal places for result (2-6)

error_messages: Invalid amount: Amount must be a positive number greater than 0.
Invalid currency code: Use valid ISO 4217 currency codes (3-letter format).
Invalid exchange rate: Exchange rate must be a positive number.
Precision error: decimal_places must be between 2 and 6.
Same currency conversion: Source and target currencies cannot be the same.
usage: Provide amount, from_currency, to_currency, and exchange_rate. Optionally set decimal_places for precision. Returns the converted amount with specified precision.
